english.segment1: Quietly I drown myself in dreams. To find it all I've taken liberty to fall asleep. Wanting everything
english.segment2: If you awake to find it's all the same. I'll try again. I swear I'll try again to fall asleep. Wanting everything. Just to be completely free
english.segment3: At least believe there's something else this time. You know you'll find me here asleep under this spell. Who'll notice?. I'm wondering myself
english.segment4: Now you gaze between love and despair. It's hard to see a look become a prayer to fall asleep. Wanting everything. Just to be completely free
english.segment5: At least believe there's something else this time. You know you'll find me here asleep under this spell. Who'll notice?. I'm wondering myself
english.segment6: All at once it occurred to me: It's the way that I'll ever be. Well never mind. What I meant to say was along the lines of making you stay. And I whisper this as you walk away. "At least believe in me"
english.segment7: At least believe there's something else this time. You know you'll find me here asleep under this spell. Who'll notice?. I'm wondering myself
